#Air hostess  n. Stewardess in a passenger aircraft.
#Airless  adj. Stuffy still, calm.
#Air letter  n. Sheet of light paper forming a letter for sending by airmail.
#Airlift  n. Emergency transport of supplies etc. By air. v. Transport thus.
#Airline  n. Public air transport system or company.
#Airliner  n. Large passenger aircraft.
#Airlock  n.  stoppage of the flow by an air bubble in a pump or pipe.  compartment permitting movement between areas at different pressures.
#Airmail  n.  system of transporting mail by air.  mail carried by air.
#Airman  n. Pilot or member of an aircraft crew, esp. In an air force.
#Air marshal  n. Raf officer of high rank, above air vicemarshal.
#Airplane  n. Us    aeroplane.
#Air pocket  n. Apparent vacuum causing an aircraft to drop suddenly.
#Airport  n. Airfield with facilities for passengers and goods.
#Air raid  n. Attack by aircraft on ground targets.
#Air rifle  n. Rifle using compressed air to fire pellets.
#Airs and graces  n.pl. Affected manner.
#Airscrew  n. Aircraft propeller.
#Airship  n. Powerdriven aircraft lighter than air.
#Airsick  adj. Nauseous from air travel.
#Airspace  n. Air above a country and subject to its jurisdiction.
#Air speed  n. Aircraft's speed relative to the air.
#Airstrip  n. Strip of ground for the takeoff and landing of aircraft.
#Air terminal  n. Building with transport to and from an airport.
#Airtight  adj. Impermeable to air.
#Air traffic controller  n. Official who controls air traffic by radio.
#Air vicemarshal  n. Raf officer of high rank, just below air marshal.
#Airwaves  n.pl. Colloq. Radio waves used in broadcasting.
#Airway  n. Recognized route of aircraft.
#Airwoman  n. Woman pilot or member of an aircraft crew, esp. In an air force.
#Airworthy  adj.   fit to fly.
#Airy  adj.    wellventilated, breezy.  flippant, superficial.  light as air.  ethereal.  airily adv.
#Airyfairy  adj. Colloq. Unrealistic, impractical.
#Aisle  n.  the part of a church on either side of the nave, divided from it by pillars.  passage between rows of pews, seats, etc. 
#Aitch  n. The letter h. 
#Aitchbone  n.  rump bone of an animal.  cut of beef over this.

#Alkalinity n.

#Alkyne  n. Chem. Unsaturated aliphatic hydrocarbon containing a triple bond and having the general formula cnhn, including acetylene.
#All  adj.  whole amount, quantity, or extent of  .  any whatever  .  greatest possible  . n.  all concerned everything  .    a the whole of  . B every one of  . C colloq. As much as  . D colloq. In a state of  .  one's whole strength or resources  .    each  . adv.  a entirely, quite  . B as an intensifier  .  colloq. Very  .    To that, or the utmost, extent  .  all along from the beginning. All and sundry everyone. All but very nearly. All for colloq. Strongly in favour of. All found with board and lodging provided free. All in colloq. Exhausted. All in all everything considered. All manner of every kind of. All of a sudden suddenly. All one     a matter of indifference. All out using all one's strength   attrib.: allout effort). All over  completely finished.  in or on all parts of  .  colloq. Typically  .  slang effusively attentive to  . All right    satisfactory safe and sound in good condition.  satisfactorily  .  a expressing consent. B as an intensifier  . All round  in all respects.  for each person. All the same nevertheless. All there colloq. Mentally alert or normal. All the time throughout  . All together all at once all in one place or in a group    . All up with hopeless for  . At all   In any way to any extent  . In all in total altogether. 
#Usage  note the differences in meaning between all together and altogether: see note at altogether.

#Usage  in current use, to and with are generally interchangeable, but with often implies a greater element of formal analysis.

#Dat  abbr. Digital audio tape.
#Data  n.pl.    known facts used for inference or in reckoning.  quantities or characters operated on by a computer etc. 
#Usage    in scientific, philosophical, and general use, this word is usually considered to denote a number of items and is thus treated as plural with datum as the singular.   in computing and allied subjects  , it is treated as a mass   noun and used with words like this, that, and much, with singular verbs, e.g. Useful data has been collected. Some people consider use   to be incorrect but it is more common than use  . However, data is not a singular countable noun and cannot be preceded by a, every, each, either, or neither, or be given a plural form datas.
#Data bank  n. Store or source of data.
#Database  n. Structured set of data held in a computer.
#Datable  adj.   capable of being dated.
#Data capture  n. Entering of data into a computer.
#Data processing  n. Series of operations on data, esp. By a computer.  data processor n.

A appointment, esp. Social with a person of the opposite sex. B us person to be met at this. v.    mark with a date.  a assign a date to  . B   assign to a particular time, period, etc.    Have its origins at a particular time.  appear or expose as oldfashioned  .  us colloq. A make a date with. B go out together as sexual partners.  out of date   oldfashioned, obsolete. To date until now. Up to date   modern fashionable current.

#Electric shock  n. Effect of a sudden discharge of electricity through the body of a person etc.
#Electrify  v.    charge with electricity.  convert to the use of electric power.  cause sudden excitement  .  electrification n.
#Electro  comb. Form of, by, or caused by electricity.

#Electrolyze  v.     subject to or treat by electrolysis.
#Electromagnet  n. Soft metal core made into a magnet by passing an electric current through a coil surrounding it.
#Electromagnetic  adj. Having both electrical and magnetic properties.  electromagnetically adv.
#Electromagnetism  n.  magnetic forces produced by electricity.  the study of these.
#Electromotive  adj. Producing or tending to produce an electric current.
#Electromotive force  n. Force set up in an electric circuit by a difference in potential.
#Electron  n. Stable elementary particle with a charge of negative electricity, found in all atoms and acting as the primary carrier of electricity in solids.

#Electronic mail  n. The sending of messages by a computer system such messages.
#Electronics  n.pl.   Science of the movement of electrons in a vacuum, gas, semiconductor, etc., esp. In devices in which the flow is controlled and utilized.
#Electronic tagging  n. The attaching of electronic markers to people or goods, enabling them to be tracked down.
#Electron lens  n. Device for focusing a stream of electrons by means of electric or magnetic fields.
#Electron microscope  n. Microscope with high magnification and resolution, using electron beams instead of light.
#Electronvolt  n. A unit of energy, the amount gained by an electron when accelerated through a potential difference of one volt.

#Usage  the phrase in the event that is considered awkward by some people. It can usually be avoided by rephrasing, e.g. In the event that it rains can be replaced by in the event of rain.

#Ever  adv.  at all times always  .  at any time  .    in any way at all  .    Constantly  .    colloq. Very very much  .  did you ever? Colloq. Did you ever hear or see the like? Ever since throughout the period since. 
#Usage  when ever is used with a question word for emphasis it is written separately  . When used with a relative pronoun or adverb to give it indefinite or general force, ever is written as one word with the relative pronoun or adverb, e.g. However it's done, it's difficult.

#Usage  excepting should be used only after not and always otherwise, except should be used.

In power, status, etc. B subside.  occur  .    show dismay or disappointment.  yield to temptation.  take or have a particular direction or place  .  a find a place be naturally divisible. B   be classed among.  come by chance or duty  .  a pass into a specified condition  . B become  .  be defeated or captured.  die.    a attack. B meet with. C embrace or embark on avidly.    begin  . n.  act of falling.  that which falls or has fallen, e.g. Snow.  recorded amount of rainfall etc.  overthrow  .  a succumbing to temptation. B   adam's sin and its results.    us autumn.    Waterfall etc.  wrestlingbout throw in wrestling.  fall about colloq. Be helpless with laughter. Fall away    incline abruptly.  become few or thin gradually vanish.  desert. Fall back retreat. Fall back on have recourse to in difficulty. Fall behind  be outstripped lag.  be in arrears. Fall in with  meet by chance.  agree with.  coincide with. Fall off  become detached.  decrease, deteriorate. Fall out  quarrel.    Become detached.  mil. Come out of formation.  result occur. Fall over backwards see  backwards. Fall over oneself colloq.  be eager.  stumble through haste, confusion, etc. Fall short be deficient. Fall short of fail to reach or obtain. Fall through fail miscarry. Fall to begin, e.g. Eating or working.

#ize  suffix   forming verbs, meaning:  make or become such  .  treat in such a way  .  a follow a special practice  . B have a specified feeling  .  ization suffix forming nouns. 
#Usage  the form ize has been in use in english since the th c. it is widely used in american english, but is not an americanism. The alternative spelling ise   is in common use, esp. In british english, and is obligatory in certain cases:   where it forms part of a larger wordelement, such as mise   in compromise, and prise   in surprise and   in verbs corresponding to nouns with s in the stem, such as advertise and televise.

#Usage  in sense a, the negative   is expressed by not have to or need not must not denotes positive forbidding, as in you must not smoke.

#Nuclear fission  n. Nuclear reaction in which a heavy nucleus splits spontaneously or on impact with another particle, with the release of energy.
#Nuclear fuel  n. Source of nuclear energy.
#Nuclear fusion  n. Nuclear reaction in which atomic nuclei of low atomic number fuse to form a heavier nucleus with the release of energy.
#Nuclear physics  n.pl.   Physics of atomic nuclei.
#Nuclear power  n.  power generated by a nuclear reactor.  country that has nuclear weapons.
#Nuclear reactor  n. Device in which a nuclear fission chain reaction is used to produce energy.
#Nuclear weapon  n. Weapon using the release of energy by nuclear fission or fusion or both.
#Nucleate  adj. Having a nucleus. v.   form or form into a nucleus. 
#Nucleic acid  n. Either of two complex organic molecules  , present in all living cells.
#Nucleon  n. Proton or neutron.
#Nucleus  n.    a central part or thing round which others are collected. B kernel of an aggregate or mass.  initial part meant to receive additions.  central core of an atom.  large dense part of a cell, containing the genetic material. 
#Nude  adj. Naked, bare, unclothed. n.  painting, sculpture, etc. Of a nude human figure.  nude person.  in the nude naked.  nudity n. 
#Nudge  v.    prod gently with the elbow to attract attention.  push gradually. n. Prod gentle push. 
#Nudist  n. Person who advocates or practises going unclothed.  nudism n.
#Nugatory  adj.  futile, trifling.  inoperative not valid. 
#Nugget  n.  lump of gold etc., as found in the earth.  lump of anything.  something valuable. 
#Nuisance  n. Person, thing, or circumstance causing trouble or annoyance. 
#Nuke  colloq. n. Nuclear weapon. v.   attack with nuclear weapons. 
#Null  adj.    invalid.  nonexistent.  without character or expression.  nullity n. 
#Nullify  v.   neutralize, invalidate.  nullification n.
#Numb  adj.   deprived of feeling paralysed. v.  make numb.  stupefy, paralyse.  numbness n.

C arithmetical value showing position in a series  .    total count or aggregate  .  numerical reckoning  .  a   Quantity, amount  . B   several  . C   Numerical preponderance  .  person or thing having a place in a series, esp. A single issue of a magazine, an item in a programme, etc.  company, collection, group  .  gram. A classification of words by their singular or plural forms. B such a form. v.  include  .  assign a number or numbers to.  amount to  .  count.  one's days are numbered one does not have long to live. Have a person's number colloq. Understand a person's real motives, character, etc. One's number is up colloq. One is doomed to die soon. Without number innumerable. 
#Usage  in sense b, a number of is normally used with a plural verb: a number of problems remain.

#Numberless  adj. Innumerable.

B specified sequence, succession, etc.  .  authoritative command, direction, instruction, etc.  state of obedience to law, authority, etc.  a direction to supply or pay something. B goods etc. To be supplied.  social class its members  .  kind sort  .  constitution or nature of the world, society, etc.  .  taxonomic rank below a class and above a family.  religious fraternity with a common rule of life.  grade of the christian ministry.  any of the five classical styles of architecture  .  a company of persons distinguished by a particular honour  . B insignia worn by its members.  eccl. The stated form of divine service  .  system of rules or procedure    . v.  command bid prescribe.  command or direct   to a specified destination  .  direct a waiter, tradesman, etc. To supply  .    Put in order regulate  .    Ordain.  in   order  in the correct   sequence or position.  fit   for use.  according   to the rules at a meeting etc. In order that with the intention so that. In order to with the purpose of doing with a view to. Of   the order of approximately. On order ordered but not yet received. Order about command officiously. To order as specified by the customer. 
#Order in council  n. Executive order, often approved by parliament but not debated.
#Orderly  adj.  methodically arranged or inclined, tidy.  wellbehaved. n.    male cleaner in a hospital.  soldier who carries orders for an officer etc.  orderliness n.
#Orderly room  n. Room in a barracks used for company business.
#Order of the day  n.  prevailing state of things.  principal action, procedure, or programme.
#Orderpaper  n. Written or printed order of the day's proceedings, esp. In parliament.
#Ordinal  n.   number defining position in a series, e.g. first, second, third, etc. 
#Ordinance  n.  decree.  religious rite. 
#Ordinand  n. Candidate for ordination.

#Ordinary seaman  n. Sailor of the lowest rank.

#Ordination  n. Conferring of holy orders, ordaining.
#Ordnance  n.  artillery military supplies.  government service dealing with these.

The waveform of alternating electric currents or light. v.   carry out   In phases or stages.  phase in   bring gradually into   use.

#Usage  the plural form of this word, phenomena, is often used mistakenly for the singular. This should be avoided.

#Pick  v.    Choose carefully.  detach or pluck   From a stem, tree, etc.  a probe with the finger, an instrument, etc. To remove unwanted matter. B clear   Of scraps of meat etc.      eat   In small bits. n.  act of picking.  a selection, choice. B right to select  .    best  .  pick and choose select fastidiously. Pick at  eat   without interest.  find fault with. Pick a person's brains extract ideas, information, etc., from a person for one's own use. Pick holes in find fault with  . Pick a lock open a lock with an instrument other than the proper key, esp. With criminal intent. Pick off  pluck   Off.  shoot   One by one without haste. Pick on  find fault with nag at.  select. Pick out  take from a larger number.  distinguish from surrounding objects identify.  play   by ear on the piano etc.    accentuate   With a contrasting colour. Pick over select the best from. Pick a person's pockets steal from a person's pockets. Pick a quarrel start an argument deliberately. Pick to pieces   take to pieces  . Pick up  grasp and raise.  a acquire by chance or without effort. B learn effortlessly.  stop for and take along with one.  become acquainted with   casually, esp for sexual purposes.    Recover, improve, etc.    Recover speed.    Arrest.  detect by scrutiny or with a telescope, radio, etc.  accept the responsibility of paying  .  resume, take up anew  .  picker n.

#Priory  n.   monastery governed by a prior or nunnery governed by a prioress. 
#Prise  v.     force open or out by leverage. 
#Prism  n.  solid figure whose two ends are equal parallel rectilinear figures, and whose sides are parallelograms.  transparent body in this form, usu. Triangular with refracting surfaces at an acute angle with each other, which separates white light into a spectrum of colours. 
#Prismatic  adj.  of, like, or using a prism.    distributed   by a transparent prism. 
#Prison  n.  place of captivity, esp. A building to which persons are committed while awaiting trial or for punishment.  custody, confinement. 
#Prisoner  n.  person kept in prison.    person in custody on a criminal charge and on trial.  person or thing confined by illness, another's grasp, etc.    person captured in war.  take prisoner seize and hold as a prisoner. 
#Prisoner of conscience  see  conscience.

#Usage  the use of pristine in sense  is considered incorrect by some people.

Best performance   or most remarkable event of its kind on record.  object serving as a memorial portrait. v.  set down in writing or some other permanent form for later reference.  convert   Into permanent form for later reproduction.  for the record as an official statement etc. Go on record state one's opinion openly, so that it is recorded. #That  demons. Pron.    person or thing indicated, named, or understood  .  contrasted with this  .    the one, the person, etc.  .     used instead of which or whom to introduce a defining clause  . demons. Adj.   designating the person or thing indicated, named, understood, etc.  . adv.  to such a degree so  .  colloq. Very  . conj. Introducing a subordinate clause indicating:  statement or hypothesis  .  purpose  .  result  .  all that very  . That is   formula introducing or following an explanation of a preceding word or words. That's that formula indicating conclusion or completion. 
#Usage  in sense  of the pronoun, that usually specifies or identifies something referred to, whereas who or which need not: compare the book that you sent me is lost with the book, which i gave you, is lost. That is often omitted in senses  and  of the conjunction: they say he is ill.

B   Denoting a class described  .  best known or best entitled to the name  .  indicating a following defining clause or phrase  .  a indicating that a singular noun represents a species etc.  . B used with a noun which figuratively represents an occupation etc.  . C   a, per  . adv.   in or by that   degree on that account  .

#There  adv.  in, at, or to that place or position  .  at that point  .  in that respect  .  used for emphasis in calling attention  .  used to indicate the fact or existence of something  . n. #Thereafter  adv. Formal after that.
#Thereby  adv. By that means, as a result of that.  thereby hangs a tale much could be said about that.
#Therefore  adv. For that reason accordingly, consequently.
#Therein  adv. Formal  in that place etc.  in that respect.
#Thereof  adv. Formal of that or it.
#Thereto  adv. Formal  to that or it.  in addition.
#Thereupon  adv.  in consequence of that.  immediately after that.
#Therm  n. Unit of heat, esp. As the statutory unit of gas supplied, equivalent to , british thermal units  .

#Thermal unit  n. Unit for measuring heat.
#Thermionic  adj. Of electrons emitted from a very hot substance. 
#Thermionic valve  n. Device giving a flow of thermionic electrons in one direction, used esp. In the rectification of a current and in radio reception.
#Thermo  comb. Form heat. 
#Thermocouple  n. Device for measuring temperatures by means of a pair of different metals in contact at a point and generating a thermoelectric voltage.
#Thermodynamics  n.pl.   Science of the relations between heat and other forms of energy.  thermodynamic adj.
#Thermoelectric  adj. Producing electricity by a difference of temperatures.
#Thermometer  n. Instrument for measuring temperature, esp. A graduated glass tube containing mercury or alcohol. 
#Thermonuclear  adj.  relating to nuclear reactions that occur only at very high temperatures.    using thermonuclear reactions.
#Thermoplastic  adj. That becomes plastic on heating and hardens on cooling. n. Thermoplastic substance.
#Thermos  n.   propr. Vacuum flask. 
#Thermosetting  adj.   setting permanently when heated.
#Thermosphere  n. Region of the atmosphere beyond the mesosphere.

Expressing multiplication  .  lifetime  .    Conditions of life or of a period  .  slang prison sentence  .  apprenticeship  .  period of gestation.  date or expected date of childbirth or death.  measured time spent in work.  a any of several rhythmic patterns of music. B duration of a note. v.    choose the time for.  do at a chosen or correct time.  arrange the time of arrival of.  ascertain the time taken by.  against time with utmost speed, so as to finish by a specified time. Ahead of time earlier than expected. All the time  during the whole of the time referred to  .  constantly. At one time  in a known but unspecified past period.  simultaneously. At the same time  simultaneously.  nevertheless. At times intermittently. For the time being until some other arrangement is made. Half the time colloq. As often as not. Have no time for  be unable or unwilling to spend time on.  dislike. Have a time of it undergo trouble or difficulty. In no time  very soon.  very quickly. In time  not late, punctual.  eventually.  in accordance with a given rhythm. Keep time move or sing etc. In time. Pass the time of day colloq. Exchange a greeting or casual remarks. Time after time  on many occasions.  in many instances. Time and   again on many occasions. The time of one's life period of exceptional enjoyment. Time out of mind a longer time than anyone can remember. Time was there was a time.

#To , before a vowel, when stressed prep.  introducing a noun expressing: a what is reached, approached, or touched  . B what is aimed at  . C as far as  . D what is followed  . E what is considered or affected  . F what is caused or produced  . G what is compared  . H what is increased  . I what is involved or composed as specified  .  introducing the infinitive: a as a verbal noun  . B expressing purpose, consequence, or cause  . C as a substitute for to + infinitive  . adv.  in the normal or required position or condition  .    in a nearly closed position.  to and fro  backwards and forwards.  repeatedly between the same points.

#Un  abbr. United nations.
#Un  prefix  added to adjectives and participles and their derivative nouns and adverbs, meaning: a not  . B reverse of    .    added to nouns, meaning a lack of, the reverse of  . 
#Usage  the number of words that can be formed with this prefix   is virtually unlimited consequently only a selection can be given here.
#Un  prefix added to verbs and   nouns, forming verbs denoting:  reversal  .  deprivation  .  release from  .  causing to be no longer  . 
#Usage  see note at un.
#Un  prefix chem. Denoting one, combined with other numerical roots nil  , un  , bi  , etc., to form the names of elements based on the atomic number, and terminated with ium, e.g. Unnilquadium   , ununbium   .

#Up  adv.  at, in, or towards a higher place or a place regarded as higher, e.g. The north, a capital or a university  .  a to or in an erect or required position or condition  . B in or into an active condition  .  in a stronger or leading position  .  to a specified place, person, or time  .  higher in price or value  .  a completely  . B more loudly or clearly  .  completed  .  into a compact, accumulated, or secure state  .  out of bed, having risen  .  happening, esp. Unusually  .    appearing for trial etc.  .    Being repaired.    in the saddle. prep.  upwards and along, through, or into  .  from the bottom to the top of.  a at or in a higher part of  . B towards the source of  . adj.  directed upwards  .  of travel towards a capital or centre  . n. Spell of good fortune. v.    colloq. Start, esp. Abruptly, to speak or act  .  raise  .  be all up with be hopeless for  . On the up   colloq. Steadily improving. Up against  close to.  in or into contact with.  colloq. Confronted with  .
#Up  prefix in senses of  up, added:  as an adverb to verbs and verbal derivations,   upwards  .  as a preposition to nouns forming adverbs and adjectives  .  as an adjective to nouns  .

#Watt  n. Si unit of power, equivalent to one joule per second, corresponding to the rate of energy in an electric circuit where the potential difference is one volt and the current one ampere.

#Watthour  n. Energy used when one watt is applied for one hour.

#When  interrog. Adv.  at what time?  on what occasion?  how soon? rel. Adv.   At or on which  . conj.  at the or any time that as soon as  .  although  .  after which and then but just then  . pron. What time? which time  . n. Time, occasion  . 
#Whence  formal interrog. Adv. From what place? conj.  to the place from which  .    From which.  and thence  . 
#Usage  the use of from whence rather than simply whence  , though common, is generally considered incorrect.
#Whenever  conj. & adv.  at whatever time on whatever occasion.  every time that.
#Whensoever  conj. & adv. Formal    whenever.
#Where  interrog. Adv.  in or to what place or position?  in what respect?  . rel. Adv.   In or to which  . conj.  in or to the or any place, direction, or respect in which  .  and there  . pron. What place?  . n. Place scene of something  . 
#Whereabouts  interrog. Adv. Approximately where? n.   Person's or thing's location.
#Whereas  conj.  in contrast or comparison with the fact that.    taking into consideration the fact that.
#Whereby  conj. By what or which means.
#Wherefore  adv. Archaic  for what reason?  for which reason. n. See  why.
#Wherein  conj. Formal in what or which place or respect.
#Whereof  conj. Formal of what or which.
#Whereupon  conj. Immediately after which.
#Wherever  adv. In or to whatever place. conj. In every place that.
#Wherewithal  n. Colloq. Money etc. Needed for a purpose.
#Wherry  n.    light rowingboat usu. For carrying passengers.  large light barge. 
#Whet  v.    sharpen  .  stimulate  . 
#Whether  conj. Introducing the first or both of alternative possibilities  .  whether or no whether it is so or not. 
#Whetstone  n. Tapered stone used with water to sharpen tools.
#Whew  int. Expressing surprise, consternation, or relief. 
#Whey  n. Watery liquid left when milk forms curds. 
#Which  interrog. Adj. Asking for choice from a definite set of alternatives  . rel. Adj. Being the one just referred to and this or these  . interrog. Pron.  which person or persons?  .  which thing or things?  . rel. Pron.    which thing or things, usu. Introducing a clause not essential for identification  .  used in place of that after in or that  . 
#Whichever  adj. & pron. Any which  .
#Whiff  n.  puff or breath of air, smoke, etc.  smell.    trace of scandal etc.  small cigar. 
#Whig  n. Hist. Member of the british reforming and constitutional party succeeded in the th c. By the liberal party.  whiggery n. Whiggish adj. Whiggism n. 
#While  n. Period of time  . conj.  during the time that for as long as at the same time as  .  in spite of the fact that whereas  . v.     pass   In a leisurely or interesting way. rel. Adv.   During which  .  between whiles in the intervals. For a while for some time. In a while soon. The while in the meantime. Worth while   worth the time or effort spent. 
#Usage  worth while   is used only predicatively, as in thought it worth while to ring the police, whereas worthwhile is used both predicatively and attributively.
#Whilst  adv. & conj. While.

B whips' written notice requesting or requiring attendance for voting at a division etc., variously underlined according to the degree of urgency  . C   party discipline and instructions  .  dessert made with whipped cream etc.     whipperin. v.    beat or urge on with a whip.  beat   Into a froth.  take or move suddenly, unexpectedly, or rapidly  .  slang steal.  slang a excel. B defeat.  bind with spirally wound twine.  sew with overcast stitches.  whip in bring   together. Whip on urge into action. Whip up excite or stir up.

B   summon or give a signal to   By whistling.    Produce   by whistling.    vainly seek or desire.

#Zoological garden  n.   Public garden or park with a collection of animals for exhibition and study.
#Zoology  n. The study of animals.  zoologist n. 
#Usage  the second pronunciation given for zoology, zoological, and zoologist, with the first syllable pronounced as in zoo, although extremely common, is considered incorrect by some people.
#Zoom  v.  move quickly, esp. With a buzzing sound.  cause an aeroplane to mount at high speed and a steep angle.      change rapidly from a long shot to a closeup  .    Rise sharply. n.  aeroplane's steep climb.  zooming camera shot. 
#Zoom lens  n. Lens allowing a camera to zoom by varying the focal length.
#Zoophyte  n. Plantlike animal, esp. A coral, sea anemone, or sponge. 
#Zoroastrian    adj. Of zoroaster   or the dualistic religious system taught by him. n. Follower of zoroaster.  zoroastrianism n. 
#Zr  symb. Zirconium.
#Zucchini  n.   esp. Us & austral. Courgette. 
#Zulu  n.    member of a s. African bantu people.  their language. adj. Of this people or language.
